text: 'uqsim allah taealaa bialnujum 'iidha ghabt, ma hada muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam ean tariq alhdayt walhq, wama kharaj ean alrshad, bal hu fi ghayat alastqamt walaietidal walsdad, walays ntqh sadrana ean hawaa nfsh. ma alquran wama alsanat 'iilaa wahy min allah 'iilaa nabih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
